definition: to smoke/to fumigate/to assail the nostrils/to perfume
fragrance/warm/to educate/variant of 熏[xun1]/to smoke/to fumigate

sentences.english: This is a kind of lavender-water.
This is a kind of bagpipe.
French Lavender, Aloe Vera, Vitamin E.
sentences.chinese: 法国熏衣草，芦荟，维它命。

sentences.english: I still faint when seeing the flower field planting Lavender.
sentences.chinese: 看到种熏衣草的花田，我还是晕。

sentences.english: The lavandula spica is one kind of strongly fragrant indigo blue floret.
sentences.chinese: 熏衣草是一种馥郁的紫蓝色的小花。

sentences.english: Rapid micro-propagation and cultivating strong plantlets of Lavandula vera were studied.
sentences.chinese: 对熏衣草微体快速繁殖和壮苗技术进行了研究。

sentences.english: Using a small amount of lavender and massaging it into your throat it can also help to relieve coughs.
sentences.chinese: 用少量的熏衣草油在咽喉部按摩有助于缓解咳嗽。

sentences.english: Last week we were planting lavender and cleaning the kayaks.
sentences.chinese: 上星期我们种了熏衣草，清理了小划艇。

sentences.english: Lavender-colored flowers speak of wealth and wisdom when given as a gift.
sentences.chinese: 采用熏衣草颜色的礼物呢，被认为代表着富裕和智慧。

sentences.english: The lavandula spica colored language is waits for love the miracle.
sentences.chinese: 熏衣草的花语是等待爱情的奇迹。

sentences.english: Lavender can also be used to reduce high blood pressure due to its sedative abilities.
sentences.chinese: 熏衣草也可以降低血压，因为它具有镇静作用。

definition: aromatic herb/vanilla/alternative name for Eupatorium fortunei/(fig.) loyal and dependable person (old)
